shortDescription: Netgear RAX43 version 1.0.3.96 contains a command injection vulnerability. The readycloud cgi application is vulnerable to command injection in the name parameter.
vulnerabilityName: NETGEAR rax43_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
